hymn.title: Turn, turn my heart to You

layout.singingstanza: Turn, turn my heart to You; Lord, I con -- fess my heart is un -- true. Turn, turn my wan -- der -- ing heart; Lord, un -- to me Thy love im -- part. Lord, I call, I call on Thee. You're the on -- ly One for me!

lyrics.stanza: Lord, I call, I call on Thee. You're the only One for me!
Rich, rich, He's rich to all, Rich unto all that call on His name. Rich, rich, He's rich, so call; Now and forever, Jesus the same.
Love, love, the love of God Flows as a river, full to the brim. Love, love, I'm filled with love, Crazy in love with Jesus within.
